TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceContainer extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer, class System.IDisposable, class System.IServiceProvider
Public Class ServiceContainer Implements IDisposable, IServiceContainer, IServiceProvider
public ref class ServiceContainer : IDisposable, IServiceProvider, System::ComponentModel::Design::IServiceContainer
type ServiceContainer = class interface IServiceContainer interface IDisposable interface IServiceProvider

summary.span: 提供 接口的简单实现。

span.span: Provides a simple implementation of the interface.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象可用于存储和提供服务。The object can be used to store and provide services. 实现 接口。 implements the interface. 可以使用添加父 对象的构造函数来创建对象，通过该构造函数可以选择性地在所有父对象（包括直接父对象）中添加或删除服务。 The object can be created using a constructor that adds a parent through which services can be optionally added to or removed from all parent objects, including the immediate parent . 若要在 通过父级链接到 此的所有实现中添加或删除服务，请调用接受布尔值的或方法重载，该布尔值指示是否升级服务请求 .To add or remove a service from all implementations that are linked to this through parenting, call the or method overload that accepts a Boolean value indicating whether to promote the service request. > [!NOTE] > 应用于此类的 特性具有以下属性值：。 The attribute applied to this class has the following property value: . 不影响桌面应用程序（通常通过双击图标、键入命令或在浏览器中输入 URL 来启动这些应用程序）。The does not affect desktop applications (which are typically started by double-clicking an icon, typing a command, or entering a URL in a browser). 有关详细信息，请参阅类或[SQL Server 编程和宿主保护特性](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md)。For more information, see the class or [SQL Server Programming and Host Protection Attributes](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md). ## Examples 下面的示例程序演示了服务链接以及链接对象链的结果服务可用性。The following example program demonstrates service chaining and the resultant service availability of a chain of linked objects. 该程序提供了一个用户界面，使您可以查看链接服务链中服务的可用性，并使用、 和方法以及链接的服务容器。The program provides a user interface that allows you to see the availability of services within a chain of linked services, and uses the , , and methods as well as linked service containers. [!code-cpp[ServiceArchitectureExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ServiceArchitectureExample/CPP/serviceform.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ServiceArchitectureExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ServiceArchitectureExample/CS/serviceform.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ServiceArchitectureExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ServiceArchitectureExample/VB/serviceform.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果服务在容器中本地不可用，则服务容器使用此服务对象提供程序来检索服务。The service container uses this service object provider to retrieve services, if they are not available locally in the container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回在此上直接实现的默认服务。This property returns the default services that are implemented directly on this . 此属性的默认实现是返回和类型。the default implementation of this property is to return the and types. 您可以重写此属性并返回您自己的类型，同时修改的默认行为。You may override this property and return your own types, modifying the default behavior of .

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: Disposes this service container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 遍历容器中的所有实例化服务并释放实现的任何服务，并清除服务列表。 walks all instantiated services within the container and disposes any that implement , and clears the service list. 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用后，必须释放对的所有引用，以便垃圾回收器能够回收占用的内存。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

param.span: 如果 正在被释放的过程中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is in the process of being disposed of; otherwise, .
Disposes this service container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 遍历容器中的所有实例化服务并释放实现的任何服务，并清除服务列表。 walks all instantiated services within the container and disposes any that implement , and clears the service list. 此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()`调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`的方法， `disposing`并将参数`true`设置为。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 在`Dispose` 设置 `disposing` 为 `false` 的情况调用。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当参数为 true 时，此方法释放该引用的任何托管对象所持有的所有资源。 `disposing`When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 当重写时，请注意不要引用先前在调用时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关 和 的详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).
